citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:08 PM on
04-OCT-16.
Upon arriving at the site the licensee was contacted by phone. He stated that he was out of town, and would not
return that day.
